title: Minecraft: Story Mode – Season 2: The Telltale Series – All Episodes (1-5)
body:
Minecraft: Story Mode – Season 2: The Telltale Series – All Episodes (1-5)


Genres/Tags: Adventure, 3D, Retro look
Company: Telltale Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 6.3 GB
Repack Size: 3.2 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Minecraft.Story.Mode.Season.Two.Episode.5-CODEX ISO release: codex-minecraft.story.mode.season.two.episode.5.iso (6,790,250,496 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed from some game archives, but original compression is preserved, so you won’t experience any lagging during gameplay unlike with repacks with all resources decompressed
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.3 to 3.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 7-20 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Now that Jesse and the gang have vanquished the Wither Storm, saved the world, and become totally super famous heroes, life has gotten a bit more…complicated. With more responsibilities and less time for adventure, old friendships have started to fade — at least until Jesse’s hand gets stuck in a creepy gauntlet that belongs to an ancient underwater temple. Together with old pals and new comrades alike, Jesse embarks on a brand new journey filled with tough choices, good times, and at least one temperamental llama.

Includes access to all 5 episodes (Episodes 1-5 available now!) in this brand new season from the award-winning studio, Telltale Games.
